sentences.sContent: In scorn of that audience, he imagines another audience, another audience to write for and to emulate, an audience represented by the fisherman.
sentences.sContent_eng: In scorn of that audience, he imagines another audience, another audience to write for and to emulate, an audience represented by the fisherman.
sentences.sCn: 讽刺这个观众，他想象着另一个观众，可以为之写作，做榜样的观众，渔夫代表了这个观众。

remMethod.val: fisher(捕鱼) ＋ man → 渔民， 渔夫

trans.tranOther: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job
